charges.charge_disposition: Bureau of prisons-91 months as to count 1 and 60 months as to count 2 to run consecutively to count 1; Ct recommends dft be designated to a CA institution; spv release % years as to count 1 and 3 years as to count 2 to run concurrently with count 1; penalty assessment $100; no fine; restitution ordered in amt $13,402.00 to be paid to Great Western Bank/Fraud Investigations Dept 9401 Oakdale Avenue, Chatsworth CA 91311, Attn Lou Bobbitt, through the inmate financial program SENTENCE REDUCED 1/29/97-Dft's previously imposed sentence of 151 months shall be reduced by 24 to 127 months (Ct 1-67 months, ct 2-60 months to run consecutively) (1s)
